metadata.author: Security Scanner Team
metadata.description: Detects PostgreSQL version from database banner or startup messages. This is a reliable indicator when connecting to PostgreSQL databases.

test_cases.input: PostgreSQL 15.2 (Debian 15.2-1.pgdg110+1) on x86_64-pc-linux-gnu, compiled by gcc (Debian 10.2.1-6) 10.2.1 20210110, 64-bit
